SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.sem.interfaces

Interface EventObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
Baby, Father, Child, Mother, Person, Radiator, Teenager, Window
public interface EventObserver
EventObserver interface for Observer pattern It is used to update events in observers which are added in EventObservable Observers are Window, Radiator and Person classes

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    updateEvent(Event<?> event)
    Update event in observer Each observer updates different events
